Uses of Class
edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.AbstractFeatureExtractor

  • Packages that use AbstractFeatureExtractor 
    Package Description
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train
    Training routines for base generative models (e.g., phrase tables, lexical reordering models).

    • Uses of AbstractFeatureExtractor in edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train

      Subclasses of AbstractFeatureExtractor in edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CountFeatureExtractor
      Extractor for printing the number of occurrences of each alignment template.
      class  DTUFeatureExtractor 
      class  LexicalReorderingFeatureExtractor
      Extractor for lexicalized re-ordering probabilities of Moses.
      class  MosesPharoahFeatureExtractor
      Extractor for the five base feature functions of Moses/Pharaoh (four translation probabilities plus phrase penalty).
      class  PhiFeatureExtractor
      Extractor for p(e|f), one of the five base feature functions of Moses/Pharaoh.
      class  ReorderingWithSyntaticPhrasalCategoryFeatureExtractor
      This class follows the idea of OldLexicalReorderingFeatureExtractor, but instead of conditioning on the phrases, we label each statistical phrase with the syntatic phrasal categories and condition on those.
      class  ShallowSyntacticContextFeatureExtractor
      Feature extractor collecting function words appearing right next to a given alignment template.
      class  SoftMosesPharoahFeatureExtractor 
      class  SparseVectorFeatureExtractor
      Class that associates one sparse vector to each alignment template.
      class  SyntacticPhraseReorderingFeatureExtractor
